channel.title: Bug: Load Loop in surface tension
channel.description:
After loading in surface tension, if I try walk or mouse click the game load again, and again...
I recorded a video:
[youtu.be/ibExXlpgL0M](https://youtu.be/ibExXlpgL0M)
[code]] status hostname: Black Mesa version : 100003/24 100003 insecure map : bm_c2a5e at: -2318 x, -5 y, 104 z tags : players : 1 humans, 0 bots (1 max) edicts : 1239 used of 2048 max # userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr # 16 "rique" STEAM_ID_PENDING 03:53 24 0 active loopback
] getpos setpos -2318.232910 -5.458943 104.031250;setang 0.587769 -33.678589 0.000000[/code]

item.title: Bug: Load Loop in surface tension
item.dc:creator: omegalucas
item.description:
Load an earlier save. The save you are trying to load triggers the explosion of the tripmine room for some reason.

Read full topic
